comentario: This is the BEST song of this album. Everything- the lyrics, beats,  music just sits perfectly. I listen to it with my eyes closed and I've literally cried to it sometimes too. I have, am and will always listen to this masterpiece with same feelings. Every Time.

Thought I almost died in my dream again (Baby, almost died)

Fightin' for my life, I‚ÄÖcouldn't‚ÄÖbreathe again

I'm fallin'‚ÄÖinto new (Oh, oh)

Without you goin'‚ÄÖsmooth (Fallin' in)

This one is my favourite from After Hours. I think this track represents the whole album: first part is full of peace, the author describes his affection to his loved one - first few tracks from the album are about it. He tells her he'll never leave her.
In the second part (starting with ,,my darkest hours" verse) the tempo is faster and we know from lyrics that he is in the party, probably with other girls. We know that he came back to his old ways (Hearthless, Faith, maybe a part of Blinding Lights - in these songs he is the other version of himself, the 'party' version).
I love the beat to this song. I think this would be a good album to listen to in a car.
I think The Weeknd is the only artist I can just sit at my computer and do nothing but listen to his music, it's so damn good

Like Drake said at the 2019 Grammys:
"You've already won if you have people singing your songs word for word, if you're a hero in your hometown. I promise you, you already won."
